data.message: It would be great if next time #facebook posts something I didn't receive 6-8 notifications. I may have to block you.

replies.message: Yikes! Sorry about that glitch, Robyn! Our engineers are working hard on fixing this bug now. Thanks for your patience as we work through this technical difficulty. It’s helpful if you can report the bug at: http://on.fb.me/1oF6Dql. -Hailey
I reported it but you may have already fixed it.
helloo facebook... can u make an options to add or remove the share button on fb account and facebook pages? we want more privacy setiings on fb accounts & pages.. thanks & more power to facebook
